#define BZ_GET_FAST(cccc)                     \
445
    /* c_tPos is unsigned, hence test < 0 is pointless. */ \
446
0
    if (s->tPos >= (UInt32)100000 * (UInt32)s->blockSize100k) return True; \

0

459
0
   { if (((i) & 0x1) == 0)                                    \

0
